tasks.task: Milking and caring for cows on a farm
subtasks: Interacting with Granny, the elderly cow
Addressing Annabelle's stubbornness during morning routines
Mixing feed components in a silo
Loading feed into a mixer and distributing it to cows via a trailer
Ensuring feed nutrition meets milk production requirements

tasks.task: Documenting farm operations and cattle care practices
subtasks: Creating a documentary-style video series focusing on the farm
